context: Hello! Are you looking for a movie suggestion?
What kind of movies do you like?

I love those. If you like old terror movies, you might like The Amityville Horror (1979) . There is also a really funny movie that I saw at the urging of my newphew called Tucker & Dale vs. Evil (2010) .
yeah! but i need some new movies suggestion like past year
resp: Everybody seemed to love A Quiet Place (2018) . I haven't seen it yet but plan to.
